names.english: supplement the kidneys and disinhibit urination decoction
names.commonEnglish: Supplement the Kidneys and Disinhibit Urination Decoction

actions: Tonifies Qi and Blood, strengthens the Spleen, raises the Yang Qi of the Spleen and Stomach, promotes urination, promotes the discharge of pus, generates flesh and expels toxins.
Tonifies the Middle Jiao, augments Qi, nourishes the Blood and promotes the generation of Body Fluids.
With Fu Ling, for Spleen and Stomach Deficiency.
With Huang Qi, for Lung and Spleen Qi Deficiency.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens the Yang and benefits Jing.
Promotes urination and leaches out Dampness.
Promotes urination, clears Damp-Heat and promotes urination to solidify the stool.
With Ze Xie, for Lin Syndrome, edema and distention.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness and strengthens the Spleen.
With Ze Xie, for Dampness leading to edema, jaundice, diarrhea, Milky Lin, and scanty, difficult urination with abdominal distention.
With Che Qian Zi, for Lin syndrome, especially Milky Lin.
Breaks up Blood Stasis, invigorates Blood circulation and drains abscesses.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, opens the channels and alleviates pain.
With Tao Ren, for all types of Blood Stagnation.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, reduces swelling and promotes the discharge of pus.
With Wang Bu Liu Xing, for abdominal masses and accumulations.
Promotes the movement of Blood, invigorates the channels, reduces swelling and drains abscesses.
Warms the Kidneys, Spleen and Heart, strengthens Yang and Ming Men Fire, disperses deep Cold, warms and unblocks the channels and vessels and alleviates pain.
Warms and Reinforces the Spleen and Kidneys
Invigorates the Blood
Breaks up Stasis

symptoms: Low back, knees and abdomen feel cold, weak and painful
Lower abdomen feels cold and painful
Forceless urination with a thin stream
Maybe impotence or decreased sexual desire
manifestations.tongueCoat: Thin and white or White and greasy
manifestations.pulse: Deep, thready, weak and maybe slow
